cause.description:
As our national philanthropy, Lambda Sigma Upsilon Latino Fraternity Incorporated would like to promote HIV/AIDS Awareness and raise as much money as possible for AIDS research. Any additional donations from non-brothers is also greatly appreciated.
1. Provide assistance to organizations nationwide that directly serve those affected by HIV/AIDS
2. Help spread awareness of the causes and effects of HIV/AIDS
3. Ensure support to those individuals effected by HIV/AIDS
cause.mission: To raise money for the research and awareness of HIV/AIDS.
cause.name: LSU supports AIDS Research & Awareness
